SoCreate, founded in 2015, is a privately held company that’s funding the development of revolutionary cloud-based screenwriting software. The SoCreate Screenwriting Platform will make it fun and easy to turn anyone’s amazing ideas into a TV or movie script. In addition, SoCreate is building an e-commerce backend that will power financials for SaaS companies (such as SoCreate Screenwriting Platform) in direct to consumer sales. Since its inception, SoCreate has completed hundreds of hours of research, design, and development on the screenwriting software and its elements. In 2019, SoCreate will launch beta trials to interested screenwriters who are tired of wrestling with frustrating, traditional screenwriting software, who want a single place to take their ideas from inspiration to completion, and who desire a software that will allow their creativity to flow in new, unbounded ways. We believe that if we work hard and stay focused, we will become the primary service for writing dialogue-driven stories for stages and screens.

Inflow Music is a social token platform that helps artists directly monetize their community and rewards fans for their support. MUST have a strong interets in crypto, blockchain, music, NFTs and ethereum.

We are looking for a front end devloper with React.js experience. We are pre funding and will be raising our round soon so there is an oppurtunity for full time employment after. Design skills and blockchain experience are a huge plus. Position is unpaid but depending on profeciancy level we can arrange a stipend. If you are experienced with solidity compensation is available automatically.

Tasks you would be in charge of:
-Integrating APIs (soundcloud, Cirlce, biconomy, convo.space etc.)
-Creation of admin features
-Edits to current web app

Feel free to directly email Alexander@inflowmusic.io with past work

We are a software company. Code is what we live and breathe.

But being an iOS engineer at TeraThought is so much more than writing code. It’s about creativity, solving problems, your left and right brain working together. It’s about spreading your wings beyond development and collaborating with other teams. It’s about having the courage to stay at the bleeding edge of technology, not merely keeping up with the industry standard of today, but trailblazing what it will be tomorrow. From the frontend to the backend, we have innovated on all parts of the iOS stack:

  • SwiftUI - Apple's latest UI toolkit that allows for efficient UI development
  • Kotlin Multiplatform - A shared backend with a best-in-class integration experience, even for iOS
  • Firebase, SQLDelight and Coroutines - Tooling that makes backend endpoints simple

We don't expect you to know any parts of our iOS stack, after all these tools are incredibly new. However, we expect you to be excited about learning and developing with the coolest iOS stack!

If all of that’s been the “what” and the “how”, then Connexus is the “why”. Connexus is our flagship product - it defines a new industry as the first resource sharing network. By leveraging circles of trust from existing communities, Connexus helps people borrow and lend nearly anything, saving people’s money as well as the environment.

If you’re wondering how many years of experience you need for this, don’t.

Your enthusiasm and desire to learn is far more important than how much you know coming in. We invest heavily in the growth of each of our teammates, and through our team of domain-experts, there are endless learning opportunities in and outside the world of development.

So, are you a curious, lifelong learner? Do you relish solving creative problems? Do you yearn to make a real and unique impact on the communities around you? Is a tight-knit, agile team of like-minded individuals up your alley? Are you an eager, driven individual who loves code?

Then you’re perfect for our team, and our team is perfect for you. Apply!

position: Machine Learning Remote Fellowship-United States-Mountain Time (fellowship.ai/apply)
description:
Data Science is not knowledge to be acquired but rather an art that must be learned through practice. The number one qualification employers look for when hiring a data science candidate is previous experience. Our fellowship gives aspiring data scientists the chance to hone their skills by building real-world machine learning applications.

  • build scalable machine learning models with agile software development methodology
  • full-time for 4 months mentoring by seasoned data scientists pair program with other fellows and mentors we are based in San Francisco, New York, London and Singapore
  • apply latest research in deep learning, ensemble learners, optimization techniques, etc.
  • interface directly with commercial customers
  • work on enhancement to the solution portfolio https://launchpad.ai/solutions

Check out https://platform.ai/blog which showcases the work done by some of our fellows.

Fellows from previous cohorts are now in data science roles at Uber Advanced Technologies Center, Google Brain, Sentient Technologies, Yelp, Orange, etc.

Please apply at www.fellowship.ai/apply

Company

Flight Club is revolutionizing the global aviation market by providing pilots and aircraft owners a marketplace through which to buy and sell block time. The functionality is similar to Airbnb and other P2P rental platforms and increases affordability and availability for all market participants.
Flight club is focusing on building an umbrella of services for pilots and aircraft owners to help streamline and automate aviation processes.

Position

This is a unique opportunity to develop a commercial marketplace. The team is led directly by the CEO, with 15 years of experience leading and managing highly skilled teams.
We are looking for a Bubble (https://bubble.io/) developer to add new features to our current platform https://flightclub.life/. Bubble allows quick development of fully functional web applications without writing code.
The main technical skills are familiarity with visual design tools and some familiarity with databases. Bonus points for knowledge of HTML, CSS, and databases. Even more important than the technical skills is critical thinking - we like people that are curious and non-compromising in their quest to understand how systems work.

Skills and Qualifications

  • Ability to design user interfaces
  • Knowledge of at least one programming language (preferably JavaScript)
  • Basic knowledge of HTML and CSS
  • Experience working in a team with tight deadlines
  • Curiosity toward learning new technologies
  • Strong attention to detail
  • Optional: experience testing user interfaces
  • Optional: understanding of REST API

The Company

Developing and retaining high potential employees is the top priority for C-level executives worldwide. CariClub partners with industry-leading firms like Morgan Stanley, Deloitte, Davis Polk, and Apollo to place their employees on non-profit boards through our proprietary matching platform. Our corporate clients know that the professional and leadership skills learned during non-profit board service are exactly the ones companies struggle to cultivate through traditional leadership training programs. At CariClub, we are on a mission to develop the next generation of inclusive leaders in the corporate and philanthropic world by empowering our community of ambitious young professionals to become a driving force for good.

Check out our member demo here.

The Opportunity

CariClub is looking for a highly motivated, sharp and detail-oriented intern who is passionate about problem solving, process improvement, and harnessing technology for good. An ideal candidate has prior internship experience and has strong research and analytical skills. We want you to be extremely detail-oriented, ask thoughtful questions, and proactively bring suggestions to the table.


Projects Types
* Business development/sales
* Community engagement
* Nonprofit engagement
* Finance and operations
* UI/UX design
* Software development
* Research and analysis
* Strategy and ad-hoc projects for the CEO

Qualities that would make you a great fit:
* A self-starter, you enjoy taking initiative and seeing a project through from start to finish
* High attention to detail
* Strong research and analytical skills
* Emotional resilience, consistency, growth-oriented
* Passionate about CariClub’s mission
* Embraces challenges, not daunted by large projects
* Excellent communication skills
* Ability to take criticism and improve constantly
* Desire to manage, grow, and work with lean teams
* Adaptable and resourceful

If you're interested in learning more, please reach out - we'd love to chat!


Compensation

Compensation is commensurate with the position’s requirements and the applicant's experience. In a performance-based environment, this will include a base salary and a possible stakeholder position in the Company for full-time roles.

CariClub is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We do not discriminate against qualified applicants or employees on the basis of race, color, religion, gender identity, sex, sexual preference, sexual identity, pregnancy, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, age, marital status, physical disability, mental disability, medical condition, military status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local law, rule, or regulation.

We are a medical device healthcare startup whose focus is a clinical workflow optimization hardware/software solution requiring advanced engineering. We are seeking 3 interns to work with a Bay Area senior engineer in the R&D, project-design and prototyping phase of a new biomedical device. Knowledge, interest and experience in industry research, microelectromechanical systems technology and machine learning algorithms is helpful.

This is a paid internship.

Duration of internship: indefinite

Key objectives for the intern:

  1. Research and produce a detailed technical report of hardware solutions that exist, including research works, prototypes and commercial devices
  2. Based on PMI’s preliminary prototyping: a. Estimate the BOM and produce a detailed parts list with available options for parts, if applicable b. Perform power-budget analysis and produce detailed results and tradeoffs c. Perform thermal analysis and produce a report

If interested, please contact: joenietomd@personalizedmed.com or visit the website: https://personalizedmed.com and provide your information on the contacts page.

Please submit your resume along with any initial contact information.

This is a paid position and an NDA signature is required.

Respectfully,

Joe Nieto MD
Chief Medical Officer
Personalized Medicine, Inc..
https://www.personalizedmed.com

description:
Globex Health is an outside the box digital health company with doctors, nurses and technologists. We enable telehealth, provide remote patient monitoring, we have a stealth blockchain in health product and some exposure to genomics. We are developing a digital health marketing and branding campaign. Looking for some skills and social good-minded people to help with people who have some experience and want to get more experience.

Also working on patient experience game design, reduce loneliness, depression in elderly if any interest that, which will evolve into VR/AR
**CoVID turbocharged all that we do in digital health in NY Metro and beyond, so much was done, never published or shared. We have content and stories and materials sitting around that we need help to share.

Open to no-prior work experience as long as you are familiar and have skills to navigate/meet our needs.

Options to play bigger role if it works out in the long run

- Primary skills required: Swift/Objective C/iOS/Xcode
- Interdisciplinary studies in the design and testing of voice, speech and multimodal user interfaces.
- The successful candidate will have a strong interest—and some background—in both theoretical and practical areas relevant to the subject of voice and speech. Examples may include (but are not limited to) computational linguistics, natural language understanding/processing (NLU/NLP), UX design, speech-language-hearing (SLH), perceptual psychology. Interest in related areas (e.g., music, gaming, graphical design) a plus.
- Activities are heavy on the technical side—primarily programming.
- Activities also include usability testing—test design and execution, statistical analysis, reports.
- Communications will be in English. Fluency in other languages a plus.
- Experience with speech recognition and/or speech synthesis a plus.
- Quick learner. Self-starter. Good collaborator/team member.

We are looking for an App Developer (preferable full-stack). She/He must feel passionate about, and should significantly contribute to, the idea and the principles of WingGrab.

We expect:
-High skills in full-stack software development, especially in flutter (or Ionic), ReactJs, and NodeJs and Firebase.
-A lot of commitment.
-A lot of passion into our product.

The internship is 100% online and you must be available for video-chat once a week to show your weekly progress so, you must commit to working at least 10 hrs. a week and be fluent in English.

You will receive a task and you will get paid every time you complete the task we give you (it should take you less than a month to complete each task).

If you are interested in this internship position please send us a link to the projects you have developed in the past to show your commitment.

As a QA Intern, you’ll help launch new features and fixes to our product line. You’ll work closely with developers, product managers, and user experience designers to help facilitate high-quality production releases. Our interns are a fully integrated member of a scrum team while having the support of the entire QA team if workload becomes overwhelming, or if you need a second set of eyes for troubleshooting. As a team, we believe our time is best spent testing, so we don't spend a lot of time writing test plans which allows us to act swiftly and better streamline our internal operations. As a QA Intern you’ll have a high level of autonomy and a self starter attitude is crucial. Your typical day-to day responsibilities will include stand-up meetings, reviewing pull requests, and testing new functionalities using the Session Based Testing approach. You’ll also have weekly 1:1 meetings to facilitate an open discussion with your manager about your current needs and long term career goals.

Our mission is to empower people to see and understand how their business works, so they can innovate faster. And we hold true to our core values of: (1) innovation in everything we do; (2) passion & excellence in every area; (3) providing individual empowerment, initiative and ownership; and (4) teamwork over ego.

Responsibilities

  • Imagine, organize, and execute a comprehensive series of manual tests for new features of our web and mobile applications
  • Create and execute relevant use case scenarios based on how consumers will interact with our software to ensure an intuitive interface
  • Collaborate with product management, design, and development teams on the user interface, functionality, and specifications of new features
  • Work with the entire QA team to test larger new features that affect many areas of the product

Requirements

  • Ability to be organized and detail-oriented
  • Demonstrates creativity and curiosity
  • Can easily thrive working in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment
  • Ability to work well with others
  • Bias towards finding solutions vs. shutting down ideas
  • Can relate to Lucid Software's products and culture
  • Driven to meet Lucid's Core Values of Innovation, Passion & Excellence, Empowerment & Initiative and Teamwork over ego

Preferred Qualifications

  • High academic performance
  • Genuine enjoyment of software quality assurance work
  • Desire to be on a highly productive, fast-paced team
  • Experience with web application testing
  • Experience with development and execution of test suites

We are seeking a QA Intern to join our team in April/May 2020. This individual will help us complete major releases to our product line during the summer of 2020.

At Lucid Software our core values aren't just a pretty inspirational wall hanging. These principles work hard, just like we do. Lucidites use them, every day, whether they're discussing ideas for new projects, deciding on the best solution for a customer's problem, or interviewing candidates. It's just one of the many things that makes Lucid Software the best company to work for. Check out our Life at Lucid page and see how our core values align with yours.
We celebrate a diverse and an inclusive work environment, where we honor and support varying backgrounds, beliefs, and perspectives for the benefit of our business, including our employees and products. We are proud to be an equal opportunity workplace that has signed the Parity Pledge and strives to be a place where every Lucidite feels they belong. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know.

For a project with the United Nations, looking for a freelance web developer / designer :

  • Develop a digital platform / course for training on ceasefires and security arrangements.
    Specific tasks include:

location.city: Los Angeles • San Francisco • Palo Alto • Remote

description:
QA Software Engineer

YokD is looking for talented QA engineers to join our growing team. As a QA engineer you understand the importance of ensuring production level code is bug free for a great user experience.

We will achieve this by automating the testing of key features, as well as with manual UI testing. QA is perhaps one of the most important elements in the software development lifecycle and we are looking for passionate individuals who understand this.

We are looking for someone who has the brains to architect our CI/CD pipeline as well as implement it. Your role will involve designing and implementing unit and integration tests at various levels of the stack. You will see the fruits of your work as we grow our user base and become a staple in the fitness industry.

Company Overview

YokD is going to revolutionize the fitness industry. If you have a goal of getting fit or healthy, you’ve surely faced the dilemma of a lack of reliable options to turn to. Personal trainers are too expensive with no quality assurance, with manipulative contracts. Workout buddies drop out after a while, as they’re unmotivated also.

YoKD plans to offer the widest selection of fitness experts ready to help our users with a variety of services. Our team is really looking to change the outdated fitness game, so we are looking for passionate, energetic and fun individuals.

....

About the Role

This is a 6 month (unpaid) internship role which is designed to give you rich experience working in the fitness startup space. You will work at all levels of the stack and with diverse technologies and be actively involved in the design as well as implementation. At the end of the 6 month period, interns may be brought on paid positions with equity, depending on competence and culture fit.

You are a great candidate if:
You have one year of experience and software testing and automation.
You understand the principles of building CI\CD
You have experience testing android native applications.
You have experience building web applications or android applications.
You have experience building CI/CD pipelines for smooth development And deployment.

We are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming. Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will work with the UI/UX designers and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.

Responsibilities:

Develop new user-facing features
Build reusable code and libraries for future use
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end
Collaborate with other team members

Skills And Qualifications:
Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3
Good understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks
Some understanding of JavaScript libraries and frameworks, such as ReactJS
Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AWS
Basic knowledge of image authoring tools, to be able to crop, resize, or perform small adjustments on an image. Familiarity with tools such as as Gimp or Photoshop is a plus.
Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Github
Good understanding of SEO principles and ensuring that application will adhere to them.
Knowledge of React and Node is a plus

We are building a learning platform so any experience with educational applications is a plus!

We are looking for a highly skilled computer programmer who is comfortable with both front and back end programming.

Backend Developers will be required to see out a project from conception to final product, requiring good organizational skills and attention to detail.

Backend Developer Responsibilities:

Good Understanding of React and AWS
Connect frontend to backend using AWS
Write clean reusable code

Full Stack Developer Requirements:

Degree in Computer Science or pursuing.
Self Taught devs are welcomed.
Strong organizational and project management skills.
Familiarity with JavaScript frameworks such as React
Familiarity with AWS and deploying applications is a big plus
Excellent verbal communication skills.
Good problem solving skills.
Attention to detail.

This is not your run of the mill internship. Want to experience what it takes to build and run a venture capital firm? Come be a part of our journey to build Whiteboard Venture Partners. Interns are given freedom to shape their internship experiences (we offer a lot of interesting challenges) but are expected to (not limited to)

Interested - apply directly here: https://www.whiteboard.vc/fellowapp.html

we are seeking a candidate with a comfortable handle of Django API development. Ideally, 2-3 years of Django experience building backend for web apps. Addittionally experience building oauth is highly preferred.

About Lair East Labs

For Founders with a Global Vision

Lair East Labs is a startup accelerator based in New York that empowers founders to expand internationally. At the heart of Lair East Labs lies the 10-week accelerator. Each year 8 -12 startups take on our program and receive investments of $50K. Our 10-week program combines the best of two worlds - learn from alumni founders of top Silicon Valley-style accelerators and gain access to a network of mentors and investors with extensive experience navigating the U.S. and Asian markets. In the first three years of operation, our portfolio companies have raised $30 million funding after completing the accelerator. We support founders in their quest to build successful and sustainable ventures that solve global problems. We are founders accelerating founders. For more information: please visit: laireastlabs.com.

About the Role
We are currently seeking prospective Venture Fellows who are highly analytical and deeply passionate about startups. During this fellowship, you will play a pivotal role in supporting our team to find and evaluate transformative, breakthrough technology companies.

Responsibilities:

  • Work with our portfolio companies to support them on strategic initiatives
  • Conduct ad-hoc analysis (e.g., market sizing, analyzing survey data, pricing analysis, web analytics data)
  • Deeply understand the metrics of our portfolio companies and how they trend over time
  • Support fund operations including writing quarterly LP reports on new investments and our pipeline
  • Help program manager organize events, including product and growth sprints, program kickoff week, alumni and recruiting events
  • Conduct financial, market, and company diligence on new potential investments; desk research on industries and trends.
  • Improve current deal pipelines and optimize the overall communication flow with startups

  • BA/BS/Master candidate currently pursuing a degree in STEM/Economics/Investment/relevant degrees at a prestigious university and/or investment analysis experience
  • Strong written and oral communication skills; ability to synthesize and articulate thoughts about companies and markets concisely
  • Experience at a competitive startup or VC firm highly preferred but not required
  • Bilingual fluency in both English and Chinese preferred but not required

Deadline to Apply: *seasonal/rolling basis
*Location​: New York, NY​ ​
Start Date: seasonal/rolling basis
Hours​: 16~40 hours/week upon availability
Duration: 2~4 months

This is an educational program to help people transit into and learn about startup and venture capital fields.

Instruction:
To apply, please send a brief elaboration (within 250 words) of your interest, along with your resume and relevant writing samples/work portfolio, to hr@laireastlabs.com with the subject line “LEL Venture Fellowship 2021 - YOUR FULL NAME”. Thank you!

Yup is a system for determining the agreed-upon social value of anything on the Internet, from Tweets and YouTube videos to blogs and news articles. It provides stronger incentives for giving meaningful opinions online by allowing users to earn money and influence if their opinion is supported by other influential members of the community. When users rate content, people, or products they have both their reputation and potential income at stake, which results in better incentives for judging content meaningfully. Our goal is to create a universal, disintermediated layer of social consensus, where the agreed-upon social value of anything online can be determined without reliance on centralized platforms like YouTube or Twitter

description:
Are you tired of boring fintech apps? Are you interested in cryptocurrency? Do you want to learn more about the role it plays in the new economy and how to leverage that to your advantage? Apollo is creating the future of crypto trading and spearheading cryptoasset adoption by taking a user-first approach. We want to create a delightful user experience and a performant platform that makes users come back for more! We welcome passionate, intellectually curious and dedicated people looking to join our remote team. Check us out at www.apollodae.io.

Apollo interns will have the opportunity to advance their skills by making meaningful contributions to product development. Yes, that means your work will be shipped off to production! Aside from this, you will have the opportunity to learn how to trade from veteran traders and even create your own bots.

You’re an enthusiastic student or recent graduate with an interest in back end development. We care more about your desire to learn than your credentials. As an intern, you will support the development team in connecting various APIs, libraries, and creating modules in NodeJS.

These are some of your personality traits:

Reliable and an effective communicator
A strong commitment to quality and deadlines
Motivated by collaboration and love working on a team
Humble and hungry to learn skills within and beyond your domain
Desire for constant self-improvement and excellence
Keen attention to detail

Your expertise comprises the following:
JavaScript application design and testing
Creating Node.js applications
Designing and implementing webhooks and APIs (REST, SOAP, etc.)
JSON, REST, Firebase, Parse, PHP, and the like
Managing back end services and the interchange of data between the server and the users
Asynchronous I/O and NoSQL datastores such as MongoDB
MVC architecture
Unit testing and automation

Bonus points for:
Knowledge of Websockets: deepstream.io, sockjs, socket.io etc.
Experience with golang
Experience with front-end development frameworks like VueJS
Experience working with time-series data (stock market data etc.)

On the job you will:

Write well designed, testable, and efficient code.
Design, code, and build architecture based on new foundation principles established by the team.
Integrate various APIs, libraries and create modules as needed.
Debug issues and address performance bottlenecks.
Coordinate with product managers to meet functional requirements.
Use time tracking and management tools, such as Toggl and Trello.

We are looking for interns who can start ASAP! Remember, even if you don’t have all of the skills listed above, but are very interested in learning, we’d still love to talk to you!

To apply, submit the following information to internships@apollodae.io:

  1. Updated LinkedIn profile link (don’t sweat this!)
  2. What are you studying (or have studied)? (eg. BS Computer Science)
  3. Sample code or repo, if available
  4. Date you can start working
  5. How long you have been working with Node.js
  6. Details of experience with technologies listed above
  7. Number of hours per week you can fully commit to
  8. Something quirky/interesting about yourself

Upon conclusion of the internship, which shall last no longer than six (6) months or one (1) semester, but only for those interns with exemplary performance and work ethic may be granted an opportunity to interview with Apollo DAE for a paid position within the company if the company has the proper funding allocations for that department.

Intern understands, acknowledges, and agrees that there will be no compensation for this position.

Intern will be provided a letter of recommendation that is accurate to their position, work ethic, and performance with Apollo DAE. Intern may apply for college credit and Apollo DAE will work with interns applicable school to aid in this objective.

description:

Our team is passionate about using technology to advance local sustainable manufacturing supply chains increasing accessibility and transparency working to solve a variety of new and unique challenges, creating new products. Position: B2B SaaS Marketing & Demand Generation Intern for Supply Chain and Blockchain

Seeking an exceptionally motivated professional self starter fluent in research driven B2B lead generation channel marketing automation software and CRM for Enterprise SaaS and ERP. Must be good at business development market research, have exceptionally good writing and communication skills with knowledge of SEO, have successful experience with media as well as tradeshow and event outreach.

Needs to be creative with organic demand generation activities, webinars, trade shows, events, content, email campaigns, SEO, social media, video production and editing, and managing a tech stack of marketing automation, analytics tools, CRMs such as Hubspot and marketing strategy development. Must enjoy helping companies build brand awareness and website optimization, in between writing marketing materials and coordinating press releases and journalist communications.

Will take charge of framework for marketing plan developing KPIs and collaborating with Product and Sales Team and stakeholders while taking a metrics-driven marketing apprach leveraging analytics, and data analysis. Ideal candidate is familiar with Enterprise SaaS marketing, lead generation research using industry research tools, Enterprise SaaS - Software as a Service industries, ERP - Enterprise Resource Planning software and ideally some familiarity with Blockchain and Supply Chain. Above all must be an exception writer who is self-motivated and hungry. Former founders are especially welcome to apply! There is a lot of opportunity for growth with this position.

If you join our team, you will work on projects that really matter to real people, while developing your own potential, and having a lot of fun.

*- This role is primarily for the summer (~12 weeks), but can be ongoing.

Who we are:

PlanetRate Inc (planetrate.com) is a new start-up based on a revolutionary and transformative platform for ratings and reviews. It allows people to provide feedback on specific topics and helps businesses to understand their customers. The platform is currently translated in French, English and Romanian languages and is a portal to more than 2.7 million cities and over 250 countries.

Opportunity:

PlanetRate is currently looking to add a talented Back-End Developer to our IT team. You will have the opportunity to work on new projects that will have a direct, tangible, and visible impact on operations, logistics and improving the customer experience. If you’re tired to be just a cog in a big machine, this is the perfect job for you! There are no clients to please, our only goal is to make PlanetRate the best it can be.

This is a non-paying internship initially with the expectation that it will evolve into a full time, paying position with a generous equity award component (which will be very valuable, eventually as we see this company being very successful either as a standalone or a valuable acquisition target by a large company, more established company in one of the several markets this platform will aggressively compete and grab significant market share from). Our philosophy is that we are all motivated more if we enjoy what we do — which is why hours are flexible and may involve working remotely during the internship — and personally share in the company’s success.

This is a one-of-a-kind opportunity to get in at the ground floor and join a fast-growing startup. If this sounds challenging, exciting and fun, we want to talk to you.

Ideal Candidate

• Likes to devour code and write maintainable code
• Loves to read it and has been known to spend a weekend getting lost in a new project
• Some knowledge of Front end development won’t hurt either.
• Eager to apply their knowledge to enhance the project.
• Experience building web apps on a team but are also comfortable working independently
• Creative, resourceful and open minded
• Passion to succeed
• Treat others how they want to be treated
• Add energy to every conversation
• Find obsolete things on your task list and remove them
• Offer to help co-workers before they ask
• Leave things more organized than you found them
• Invent a moment of silliness
• Highlight good work from your peers
• Find other great employees to join the team
• Cut costs
• Help invent a new product or service that people really want
• Get smarter at your job through training or books
• Encourage curiosity
• Surface and highlight difficult decisions
• Figure out what didn't work
• Organize the bookshelf
• Start a club
• Tell a joke at no one's expense
• Smile a lot

Job Specifics:

• The perfect candidate devours code, loves to read it and has been known to spend a weekend getting lost in a new project. You can tell us why static methods aren’t necessarily a bad thing and how to best test things. You can explain what O(n log n) means. You are creative, resourceful and open minded.
• Create complex web-based applications in PHP/JavaScript and MySQL following established standards and methodologies of OO/ORM design on the LAMP stack
• Proven experience with Object Oriented PHP design and commercial web application development (not scripting)
• Experience with Web Service APIs (SOAP/REST)
• Create and improve features in existing system
• Implement bug fixes
• Work with other team members to integrate components

Requirements:

• Solid understanding of modern PHP and OOP principles
• Intermediate skills in CakePHP or any other modern framework for PHP application development
• Knowledge of HTML / CSS / Javascript / Jquery / AJAX / XML
• Intermediate skills in any modern JavaScript frameworks - JQuery, Bootstrap, etc.

• Experience with at least one NoSQL Database (MongoDB) is a plus.
• Develop and support SOAP and REST APIs
• Hands-on experience with Linux command line
• Comfortable to use source version control system, preferably SVN

• Have detail-oriented and strong problem-solving skills.

We are a startup in the recruiting space that wants to make an impact by bringing more happiness to people's work life. We are in search of a motivated self-starter who is interested in practicing their craft, while working to change the world.

What we’re looking for:​

We’re looking for a passionate developer who possesses in depth knowledge and understanding of all aspects of software development. Candidate will be expected to work remotely, and report on progress to key stakeholders.

What you will be doing:​

You will be charged with the task of designing and implementing front-end and back-end features for our state of the art platform. The ideal candidate should have an interest in working with mobile and web development. Likewise, the candidate should be comfortable with at least one programming language (Python is a major plus), and be able to comfortably implement functionality such as authentication, data binding, and asynchronous calls.

Maintain quality and ensure responsiveness of applications.
Maintain code integrity and organization.
Convert designs to visual elements.
Understand and implementation security and data protection.
Design and implement a seamless user experience between mobile and desktop
Justify critical design choices.
Attend weekly meetings remotely.

Minimum 3.5 GPA in major.
Ability to work remotely for 20hrs/week under minimal supervision.
Be reliable and accountable for agreed upon deliverables.

2-3 paragraphs about yourself.
